readable.title: 1321949151_77b77b4617
readable.content: A little boy and a little girl are lying on a black bench surrounded by adults . People at a museum standing by benches with two children laying down and one person sitting . Two children and some adults are sitting on a row of black couches . Two children lie on puffy benches at a museum while four adults look on . Two tired children rest on couches at an art museum while the adults around them view the art .
